extendedInfo.description: Baby Kick Counter is an easy way to count your baby's kicks during pregancy.  Features the ability to automatically stop counting after a particular number of kicks, or after a preset period of time.   During my wife's pregnancy last year, we had to use a clunky stopwatch to count kicks.  That experience inspired me to write this app... so for our next pregnancy, kick counting will be a breeze!   More features coming soon...

reviews.comment: Could be better! Needs to be able to save history!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Great simple easy app. Not compicated, yes doesnt archive counts, but works great for doing the counts!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: StacyAndPrincessJersey
reviews.comment: Pretty simple to use....i didn\'t give a perfect score bc personally id like to see more features....like maybe an option to log previous data....also Would be nice to have an option to log every kick instead of ONLY 10 kicks at a time.....but other than that its pretty nice!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Eh
reviews.comment: Makes it easy too count kicks, but doesn\'t keep them recorded for you.
reviews.author: Laurin Wellesley

reviews.comment: Good app, but no option to clear history of kicks.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: SORRY...THIS APP NEEDS MORE OPTIONS, LIKE SAVING KICKS....NICE LAYOUT..
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Good and easy for counting kicks per day, but no history, so I cannot show daily counts to my midwife or doctor, have to write on paper.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Replaced the old stop watch for my nightly kick counts for FREE!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: eh....
reviews.comment: I thought there would be more to it. it doesnt save any of your previous counts. whats the point of counting if you can go back to see the progress... im removing immediatly..
reviews.author: Ashley Johnson

reviews.title: app it\'s great and you can change the number count
reviews.comment: it\'s ok for the counts and to go above ten counts just move the number of steps to 99 by deleting the 10 & putting 99 or what ever number you course that\'s a 2 digit number
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Handy for kicking
reviews.comment: Always helps me keep count of how many times I kick my baby, very helpful when the little one needs sorting out.
reviews.author: A Google User
